vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.12;
son of: Adiel (H5717H); also called Amashsai (KJV: Amashai) at Neh.11.13;
Also named: a.mash.say (עֲמַשְׁסַי "Amashsai" H6023)
§ Maasiai = "work of the Lord"
a priest who returned from exile
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Adiel (Azarel); sacerdote; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪賽 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "主的工作"
由被擄之地回歸的一位祭司 #代上 9:14|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛赛 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "主的工作"
由被掳之地回归的一位祭司 #代上 9:14|
